text: The scariest thing in the world would be… if all the air in the world turned to WOOD!
Okay, like, the scariest thing in the world would be… if like you went to grab something and it wasn't there!
Could Jesus microwave a burrito so hot, that he himself couldn't eat it?
They call them fingers, but I never see them fing.
…oh, there they go.
Science is all metaphor.
Science is a liar sometimes.
Science is… wait, what was I talking about again?
Behind every good man there is a woman, and that woman was Martha Washington, man.
Every day, George would come home, and she would have a big fat bowl waiting for him when he came in the door, man.
She was a hip, hip, hip lady, man.
Walkin' down the hall, by myself, smokin' a j with fifty elves.
You ever see the back of a twenty dollar bill… on weed?
Oh, there's some crazy shit, man.  There's a dude in the bushes.  Has he got a gun?  I dunno!
RED TEAM GO, RED TEAM GO!
That weed was the shiz-nittlebam snip-snap-sack.
You have a sudden urge to flip your bible open to Genesis 1:29…
That rug really tied the room together…
I used to do drugs…  I still do, but I used to, too.
The herb reveals you to yourself.
You suddenly realize that all matter is merely energy condensed to a slow vibration, and we are all one consciousness experiencing itself subjectively.
I usually only smoke in the late evening.
Oh, occasionally the early evening, but usually the late evening, or the mid-evening.
Just the early evening, mid-evening and late evening.
Occasionally, early afternoon, early mid-afternoon, or perhaps the late mid-afternoon.
Oh, sometimes the early-mid-late-early-morning.
…But never at dusk.
Dave's not here, man.
Man, a cheeseburger sounds SO awesome right now.
Eh… maybe not.
I guess, maybe, without the cheese… yeah.
